question: Who is the newly elected chairman of the Audit Bureau of Circulations (ABC) for 2019-20?
explanation: Madhukar Kamath, chairman emeritus of advertising firm DDB Mudra Group, has been unanimously elected chairman of the Audit Bureau of Circulations (ABC) for 2019-20. Beside this, he is the president of Advertising Agencies Association of India (AAAI) and also the Â chairman of the Advertising Standards Council of India (ASCI).
